directions: In a medium bowl, mix together teriyaki sauce, ginger, sesame oil, orange zest, vinegar, water, cayenne pepper, and garlic.  Place steak in a shallow dish, and pour marinade over meat.  Cover, and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
Lightly oil the grate, and place meat on grill.  Cook for 3 to 5 minutes per side. Test for doneness.
title: BBQ Steak Teriyaki
